Package com.tngtech.infrastructure.exception

Interface Summary
Localizable  
 

Class Summary
Exceptions  
Reject Utility class to make it easier and better readable to check parameters at the beginning of methods Reject.always(...) is pointless because it cannot be a "pre condition" to uncontionally fail.
 

Exception Summary
DomainException Base exception class for all exceptions raised from violations to business logic constraints.
InitializationException Throw this exception when you have to throw an exception in intializing code
LocalizableException Exception that provides storage for a localizable error message as well as rich error details.
PreconditionException Throw this exception when a precondition in a method call does not hold.
ProblemLocatorException Exception that is helpful when you want to add a "pseudo" exception to a log.
SystemException Base exception class for all exceptions raised from violations to technical implementation constraints.
